verses.plain: Desire not a multitude of unprofitable children, neither delight in ungodly sons.

tokens.t: Desire not a multitude of unprofitable children, neither delight in ungodly sons.

verses.plain: Though they multiply, rejoice not in them, except the fear of the Lord be with them.

tokens.t: Though they multiply, rejoice not in them, except the fear of the Lord be with them.

verses.plain: Trust not thou in their life, neither respect their multitude: for one that is just is better than a thousand; and better it is to die without children, than to have them that are ungodly.

tokens.t: Trust not thou in their life, neither respect their multitude: for one that is just is better than a thousand; and better it is to die without children, than to have them that are ungodly.

verses.plain: For by one that hath understanding shall the city be replenished: but the kindred of the wicked shall speedily become desolate.

tokens.t: For by one that hath understanding shall the city be replenished: but the kindred of the wicked shall speedily become desolate.

verses.plain: Many such things have I seen with mine eyes, and mine ear hath heard greater things than these.

tokens.t: Many such things have I seen with mine eyes, and mine ear hath heard greater things than these.

verses.plain: In the congregation of the ungodly shall a fire be kindled; and in a rebellious nation wrath is set on fire.

tokens.t: In the congregation of the ungodly shall a fire be kindled; and in a rebellious nation wrath is set on fire.

verses.plain: He was not pacified toward the old giants, who fell away in the strength of their foolishness.

tokens.t: He was not pacified toward the old giants, who fell away in the strength of their foolishness.

verses.plain: Neither spared he the place where Lot sojourned, but abhorred them for their pride.

tokens.t: Neither spared he the place where Lot sojourned, but abhorred them for their pride.

verses.plain: He pitied not the people of perdition, who were taken away in their sins:

tokens.t: He pitied not the people of perdition, who were taken away in their sins:

verses.plain: Nor the six hundred thousand footmen, who were gathered together in the hardness of their hearts.

tokens.t: Nor the six hundred thousand footmen, who were gathered together in the hardness of their hearts.

verses.plain: And if there be one stiffnecked among the people, it is marvel if he escape unpunished: for mercy and wrath are with him; he is mighty to forgive, and to pour out displeasure.

tokens.t: And if there be one stiffnecked among the people, it is marvel if he escape unpunished: for mercy and wrath are with him; he is mighty to forgive, and to pour out displeasure.

verses.plain: As his mercy is great, so is his correction also: he judgeth a man according to his works

tokens.t: As his mercy is great, so is his correction also: he judgeth a man according to his works

verses.plain: The sinner shall not escape with his spoils: and the patience of the godly shall not be frustrate.

tokens.t: The sinner shall not escape with his spoils: and the patience of the godly shall not be frustrate.

verses.plain: Make way for every work of mercy: for every man shall find according to his works.

tokens.t: Make way for every work of mercy: for every man shall find according to his works.

verses.plain: The Lord hardened Pharaoh, that he should not know him, that his powerful works might be known to the world.

tokens.t: The Lord hardened Pharaoh, that he should not know him, that his powerful works might be known to the world.

verses.plain: His mercy is manifest to every creature; and he hath separated his light from the darkness with an adamant.

tokens.t: His mercy is manifest to every creature; and he hath separated his light from the darkness with an adamant.

verses.plain: Say not thou, I will hide myself from the Lord: shall any remember me from above? I shall not be remembered among so many people: for what is my soul among such an infinite number of creatures?

tokens.t: Say not thou, I will hide myself from the Lord: shall any remember me from above? I shall not be remembered among so many people: for what is my soul among such an infinite number of creatures?

verses.plain: Behold, the heaven, and the heaven of heavens, the deep, and the earth, and all that therein is, shall be moved when he shall visit.

tokens.t: Behold, the heaven, and the heaven of heavens, the deep, and the earth, and all that therein is, shall be moved when he shall visit.

verses.plain: The mountains also and foundations of the earth be shaken with trembling, when the Lord looketh upon them.

tokens.t: The mountains also and foundations of the earth be shaken with trembling, when the Lord looketh upon them.

verses.plain: No heart can think upon these things worthily: and who is able to conceive his ways?

tokens.t: No heart can think upon these things worthily: and who is able to conceive his ways?

verses.plain: It is a tempest which no man can see: for the most part of his works are hid.

tokens.t: It is a tempest which no man can see: for the most part of his works are hid.

verses.plain: Who can declare the works of his justice? or who can endure them? for his covenant is afar off, and the trial of all things is in the end.

tokens.t: Who can declare the works of his justice? or who can endure them? for his covenant is afar off, and the trial of all things is in the end.

verses.plain: He that wanteth understanding will think upon vain things: and a foolish man erring imagineth follies.

tokens.t: He that wanteth understanding will think upon vain things: and a foolish man erring imagineth follies.

verses.plain: My son, hearken unto me, and learn knowledge, and mark my words with thy heart.

tokens.t: My son, hearken unto me, and learn knowledge, and mark my words with thy heart.

verses.plain: I will shew forth doctrine in weight, and declare his knowledge exactly.

tokens.t: I will shew forth doctrine in weight, and declare his knowledge exactly.

verses.plain: The works of the Lord are done in judgment from the beginning: and from the time he made them he disposed the parts thereof.

tokens.t: The works of the Lord are done in judgment from the beginning: and from the time he made them he disposed the parts thereof.

verses.plain: He garnished his works for ever, and in his hand are the chief of them unto all generations: they neither labour, nor are weary, nor cease from their works.

tokens.t: He garnished his works for ever, and in his hand are the chief of them unto all generations: they neither labour, nor are weary, nor cease from their works.

verses.plain: None of them hindereth another, and they shall never disobey his word.

tokens.t: None of them hindereth another, and they shall never disobey his word.

verses.plain: After this the Lord looked upon the earth, and filled it with his blessings.

tokens.t: After this the Lord looked upon the earth, and filled it with his blessings.

verses.plain: With all manner of living things hath he covered the face thereof; and they shall return into it again.

tokens.t: With all manner of living things hath he covered the face thereof; and they shall return into it again.
